metadata.name: Prefetch File Deleted
metadata.comment: Detects the deletion of a prefetch file which may indicate an attempt to destroy forensic evidence

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 4 AND contains(lower(file.path), lower(':\\\\windows\\\\prefetch\\\\')) AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.pf')) AND NOT (endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\svchost.exe')) AND (contains(lower(actor.user.name), lower('authori')) OR contains(lower(actor.user.name), lower('autori')))))

output.summary: Detects the deletion of a prefetch file which may indicate an attempt to destroy forensic evidence

metadata.objective: False positive: Unknown References: Internal Research, https://www.group-ib.com/blog/hunting-for-ttps-with-prefetch-files/
